comments:
Description:
Sample DB doesn't work in deployment

Steps to reproduce:
1. Deploy birt
2. Preview report using sample DB

Expected result:
Display data

Actual result:

report report:
+ Cannot open the connection for the driver: org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.jdbc
Cannot load JDBC Driver class: org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.sampledb.Driver

+ Cannot open the connection for the driver: org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.jdbc

*** Bug 145647 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Still show same error msg, reopen it.

It's an error if use "," between filenames in <include> tag to copy files
so <include name="A,B"> doesnot work at all

Fixed.
Fixed in top-level script, keep plug-in version valid.
Verified by replace with new plugin
